verses.text: \w These|strong="H4428"\w* \w are|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* family \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w genealogical|strong="H3187"\w* records \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w those|strong="H5973"\w* \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w returned|strong="H5927"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* Babylon during \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Artaxerxes:
from the descendants of Phinehas, Gershom; from the descendants of Ithamar, Daniel; from the descendants of David, Hattush
of the descendants of Shecaniah; from the descendants of Parosh, Zechariah, and with him were registered 150 men;
from the descendants of Pahath-Moab, Eliehoenai son of Zerahiah, and with him 200 men;

from the descendants of Zattu, Shecaniah son of Jahaziel,\f + \fr 8:5 \ft Some LXX manuscripts (see also 1 Esdras 8:32); Hebrew from the descendants of Shecaniah, the son of Jahaziel\f* and with him 300 men;
from the descendants of Adin, Ebed son of Jonathan, and with him 50 men;
from the descendants of Elam, Jeshaiah son of Athaliah, and with him 70 men;
from the descendants of Shephatiah, Zebadiah son of Michael, and with him 80 men;
from the descendants of Joab, Obadiah son of Jehiel, and with him 218 men;

from the descendants of Bani, Shelomith son of Josiphiah,\f + \fr 8:10 \ft Some LXX manuscripts (see also 1 Esdras 8:36); Hebrew from the descendants of Shelomith, the son of Josiphiah\f* and with him 160 men;
from the descendants of Bebai, Zechariah son of Bebai, and with him 28 men;
from the descendants of Azgad, Johanan son of Hakkatan, and with him 110 men;
from the later \f + \fr 8:13 \ft Or the last\f* descendants of Adonikam, these were their names: Eliphelet, Jeiel, and Shemaiah, and with them 60 men;

and from the descendants of Bigvai, both Uthai and Zaccur,\f + \fr 8:14 \ft LXX, Syriac, and an alternate MT reading; the other alternate reads Zabbud.\f* and with them 70 men. Ezra Sends for the Levites

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6908"\w* \w these|strong="H5971"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w canal|strong="H5104"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* flows \w to|strong="H3117"\w* Ahava, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* searched \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3878"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H7971"\w* summoned \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w leaders|strong="H7218"\w*: Eliezer, Ariel, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, Elnathan,\f + \fr 8:16 \ft Elnathan appears three times in verse, either as a repetition for emphasis or as a record of multiple men with this name.\f* \w Jarib|strong="H3402"\w*, Elnathan, \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Meshullam|strong="H4918"\w*, as well as \w the|strong="H7971"\w* teachers \w Joiarib|strong="H3114"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* Elnathan.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w sent|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* Iddo, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w leader|strong="H7218"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Casiphia|strong="H3703"\w*, \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* kinsmen, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w servants|strong="H5411"\w* \f + \fr 8:17 \ft Hebrew the Nethinim; also in verse 20\f* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w Casiphia|strong="H3703"\w*, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w should|strong="H4725"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* since \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2896"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*—\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w insight|strong="H7922"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*—\w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, 18 \w men|strong="H1121"\w*;

\w also|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, together \w with|strong="H6242"\w* \w Jeshaiah|strong="H3470"\w*, \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3470"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3470"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H4847"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, 20 \w men|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3605"\w* \w also|strong="H1732"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* 220 \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H5411"\w* \w servants|strong="H5411"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w designated|strong="H5344"\w* \w by|strong="H5344"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* assist \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*. Fasting for Protection

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Ahava \w Canal|strong="H5104"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w*, \w so|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w might|strong="H3477"\w* \w humble|strong="H6031"\w* \w ourselves|strong="H6031"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w ask|strong="H1245"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w safe|strong="H3477"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w possessions|strong="H7399"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* ashamed \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* escort \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w soldiers|strong="H2428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w protect|strong="H5826"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* told \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H2428"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H2063"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w* \w and|strong="H6684"\w* petitioned \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H6684"\w* \w He|strong="H5921"\w* granted \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w request|strong="H1245"\w*. Priests to Guard the Offerings

\w Then|strong="H3548"\w* \w I|strong="H8147"\w* set apart \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w leading|strong="H8269"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w together|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Sherebiah|strong="H8274"\w*, \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w their|strong="H8147"\w* brothers,

\w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H4672"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w contribution|strong="H8641"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w articles|strong="H3627"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w counselors|strong="H3289"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w offered|strong="H7311"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* God.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* 650 \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*,\f + \fr 8:26 \ft 650 talents is approximately 24.5 tons or 22.2 metric tons of silver.\f* \w articles|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* weighing 100 \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*,\f + \fr 8:26 \ft 100 talents is approximately 3.77 tons or 3.42 metric tons of silver articles.\f* 100 \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*,\f + \fr 8:26 \ft 100 talents is approximately 3.77 tons or 3.42 metric tons of gold.\f*

20 \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w bowls|strong="H3713"\w* valued \w at|strong="H2896"\w* 1,000 darics,\f + \fr 8:27 \ft Or worth 1,000 drachmas; that is, approximately 18.5 pounds or 8.4 kilograms of gold\f* \w and|strong="H6242"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w articles|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w fine|strong="H2896"\w* polished \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w*, \w as|strong="H2532"\w* \w precious|strong="H2532"\w* \w as|strong="H2532"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* told \w them|strong="H3068"\w*, “You \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* these \w articles|strong="H3627"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w freewill|strong="H5071"\w* \w offering|strong="H5071"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* fathers.

\w Guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w carefully|strong="H8104"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w weigh|strong="H8254"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w leading|strong="H8269"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w heads|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* \w families|strong="H1004"\w*.”

So \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w took|strong="H6901"\w* \w charge|strong="H4948"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* sacred \w articles|strong="H3627"\w* \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w had|strong="H3548"\w* been \w weighed|strong="H4948"\w* \w out|strong="H4948"\w* \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w be|strong="H3389"\w* taken \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* our God \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w day|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Ahava \w Canal|strong="H5104"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* protect \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* bandits \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*. Arrival in Jerusalem

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* arrived \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* rested \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w weighed|strong="H8254"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* sacred \w articles|strong="H3627"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Meremoth|strong="H4822"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Uriah, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*. Eleazar \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w Jozabad|strong="H3107"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Noadiah|strong="H5129"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Binnui|strong="H1131"\w*.

\w Everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* verified \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w and|strong="H6256"\w* \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*, \w and|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w total|strong="H3605"\w* \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* \w at|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1473"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* returned \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w* sacrificed \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: 12 \w bulls|strong="H6499"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, 96 rams, 77 \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* 12 \w male|strong="H3532"\w* \w goats|strong="H6842"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w also|strong="H4428"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w edicts|strong="H1881"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* satraps \f + \fr 8:36 \ft A satrap was a Persian official.\f* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w governors|strong="H6346"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* region \w west|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H5104"\w*,\f + \fr 8:36 \ft Hebrew governors beyond the River\f* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* proceeded \w to|strong="H5414"\w* assist \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*.
